A second defence of the Short view of the prophaneness and immorality of the English stage, &c. being a reply to a book, entituled, The ancient and modern stages surveyed, &c. / by Jeremy Collier ... Short view of the immorality and profaneness of the English stage Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.
[5], 142 p.
Printed for S. Keble ... R. Sare ... and G. Strahan ..., London : 1700.
Errata: p. [3]. Advertisements on p. [1]. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
